case.title: I want to be captured - 40
case.text: If you are that person , I'm happy to pick you up . If you can host, that's good too. The most important thing about this post is that, i'm seeking for the true love of my life..A loving and caring husband..I LOVE KIDS.I want a man that can nurture and protect me . I'm fit, adventurous, divorced with 2 kids, live alone and employed.If you like my post, please leave a message,Tell me about you. I'm curious of who's out there ......
